column5: older Windlass tipup. has a metal flap that jigs for ya in the wind.  the second is the type that lays across the hole and the spool goes in the water. flag got ripped off last season. been used 2 or 3 times and comes spooled with dacron line.  pickup only in brantford. first person that pm's me gets them.
to those who pm'd me...  pm me your emails as it doesnt look like my pm messages are being sent? maybe a mod can look at this for me?
